title: Best of the Program | Guest: Bill O'Reilly | 4/22/22
description:
Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the catastrophic failure of CNN+ shutting down after only a month and Glenn's Twitter thread toward CNN's Brian Stelter regarding the shutdown. Bill O'Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, discussing CNN+s failure and the collapse of Disney. Idaho Lt. Governor Janice McGeachin joins to discuss her gubernatorial campaign and her vision for the state.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
